root.name: Minesweeper Flags
root.description: OverviewMinesweeper Flags is a Minesweeper game developed and published by TikGames for the Xbox Live Marketplace platform.GameplayMinesweeper Flags plays on the classic rules of Minesweeper, but also adds some new modes. On top of a classic mode, Minesweeper Flags adds a flags mode which is a multiplayer mode in which players take turns trying to find as many bombs as possible.Another new mode is a campaign mode in which players progress through a series of stages, set in different continents. The boards in campaign mode are various shapes rather than just the plain square.
